TEI.2.document_title: Samuel Norris to Stephen F. Austin, 09-05-1826

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel Norris to Austin, September 5, 1826. Defending James Gaines and accusing Austin of violation of legal regulations.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-05-1826">Sept 5th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Steven F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir I recd your letter by mail of the *date_mentioned n="08-27-1826">27 of August*/date_mentioned* where in you state to me the news of *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*being favourable on Slavery which I have made known in the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*wherein the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*was so much dissatisfied with the news that all thier *person_mentioned*slaves */person_mentioned*was to be set free since I have not heard from there how they have taken the news but I dont hesitate to say that I expect as usual I did not send your letter but only a coppy of the *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*news*/p*
*p*Sir it is a mistake of yours to say that I am the*person_mentioned* father in law*/person_mentioned* of *person_mentioned*Gaines */person_mentioned*I am only a *person_mentioned*Brother in law*/person_mentioned* but if he was my child its self I would not correct him if I did not believe him to be wrong he has done nothing but what has went by the knowledge of the *person_mentioned*Alcalda*/person_mentioned* of this place and I need not go further than yourself to prove all the representations that according to law should go through of this *location_mentioned*court*/location_mentioned* has not done so and you clone more than the *person_mentioned*chief of Department*/person_mentioned* done when he was applid to and it had not gone through its proper channel he sent them back to take a fair start but you did not*/p*
*p*if *person_mentioned*Gines [Gaines]*/person_mentioned* has made any fals representations I would be glad to know what they are that he may be checked in time it [is] a fine thing to check before any thing is to far gone but to check a man for obeying the orders of his *person_mentioned*Legal authority*/person_mentioned* I dont think it is right*/p*
*p*sir from the present state of affairs our stength is verry divided and it is I believe from such petitions as you translated you could have known that this man was not aiming at the fair thing as he could not obtain it here you must know in reason we have not more men than we have a use for*/p*
*p*if they could be expected by Government it appears that you had no confidence in the proper authority of this place a *person_mentioned*stranger */person_mentioned*that is not received by government should be heard and every attention paid to him without asking any questions whether he was right or wrong*/p*
*p* *person_mentioned*Samuel Norris*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
